title: Provide Windows Virtual Machine image files for Xen/KVM/QEmu.
body: Please provide Windows Virtual Machine image files for Xen/KVM/QEmu. This would help us developers/testers working without access to Windows or the possibility to install VirtualBox at work, but have access to Xen.

comments.body: A more general approach to supporting more kinds of virtual machine implementations could be to provide an ISO image that when booted would install the same thing as the currently existing images.
